name: AquaSonic Home Dental Center Rechargeable Power Toothbrush & Smart Water Flosser - Complete Family Oral Care System - 10 Attachments and Tips Included - Various Modes & Timers (White)
short_description: Complete Oral Care for the Whole Family – Home Dental Center is an all-in-one solution for your family’s oral care needs. This compact countertop station features a power toothbrush producing 31,000 VPM with 3 distinct cleaning modes, inductive charging and an auto timer. The other half of this oral wellness center features a smart water flosser that produces powerful yet gentle jets of water designed to dislodge food and stimulate and massage gums.

Power Toothbrush – The toothbrush produces a whopping 31,000 Vibrations Per Minute with 3 different modes including normal, soft, massage. It also features a built-in 2-minute auto shut-off timer and 30 second interval timer to let you know to brush different areas of your mouth. Convenient inductive charging lets you place back in its dock to charge wirelessly.

Smart Water Flosser – Home Dental Center features our renowned Aqua Flosser oral irrigator. Water flossers are more effective than traditional flossing while also being gentler on gums and teeth. A powerful and rechargeable lithium-ion battery produces directed water jets to dislodge food and plaque. It also includes 3 convenient usage modes. It is a perfect alternative to string floss for users with braces. Use Aqua Flosser to cut down flossing time.

Everything is Included – The HDC includes 10 accessories and attachments including the docking base, 4 color coded brush heads, an interdental brush head, and 4 aqua flosser tips including 2 standard nozzles, an orthodontic tip, and tongue cleaner. It includes everything needed, right out of the box.

What's in the Box – 1 Smart Toothbrush, 4 color coded brush heads, 1 interdental brush head, 1 Oral Irrigator, 2 jet nozzles, 1 orthodontic tip, 1 tongue cleaner, 1 dental mirror, 1 Docking Stand, 1 charger, warranty card, and user manual.

short_description: 【Deep and Gentle Teeth Cleaning for Improved Gum Health】Enhanced with optimal pulsations and higher pressure, h2ofloss latest water flosser delivers a potent water flow that effectively removes 99.99% of stains without damage to the gums. With 1300 pulsations per minute, it gently massages the gums, promoting blood circulation.Cleans teeth 5 times better than traditional floss picks

【Advanced Design for Daily Flossing】The water flosser features an IPX7 waterproof design, providing dual protection for both internal and external components. This prevents leakage and ensures safe use in the bathroom. Another outstanding patent is the addition of a gravity ball at the end of the tube, ensuring water flows out completely regardless of the oral irrigator orientation during teeth cleaning

【Maintain Oral Care and Cleanliness While Traveling】The rechargeable dental flosser, featuring a powerful 2500mAh lithium battery, lasts up to 30 days on a single charge. With convenient charging and a lightweight design, it's ideal for travel, helping you maintain a confident smile and fresh breath anytime, anywhere

【Suitable for All Teeth and Gums】The 360° rotatable nozzles allow for easy cleaning of hard-to-reach areas, effectively preventing tooth decay, dental calculus, bad breath, and gingival bleeding. With 6 interchangeable jet tips included, it's suitable for your whole family and ideal for those with braces and bridges

【Perfect Choice for Loved Ones】H2ofloss Dental Flosser brand is a thoughtful option for birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, Valentine’s Day, Father’s Day, or Mother’s Day—showing how much you care about your loved ones’ oral health. Backed by 24 months of after-sales service and 24-hour email support to ensure your satisfaction

Directions Begin by letting your dog taste a small amount of tasty Nylabone Dental Toothpaste. Using your finger, gently rub teeth and gums in a circular motion. Introduce the toothbrush or finger brush with a small amount of toothpaste. Allow your dog to taste the toothpaste, then start brushing gently with a back & forth motion (no rinsing is necessary).. Store at room temperature.

HOW TO REPLACE TIPS: Turn off the device and place it on a flat surface. Hold firmly, press and hold the Tip Release Button to release the old tip, carefully pull it out, then align and slide in the new tip until you hear a click.
